title: Freedom of Information Act ("FOIA) regarding releases and gate money

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

The number of releases during Fiscal Year 2024 from each IDOC facility separated by facility (Big Muddy River Correctional Center, Centralia Correctional Center, Danville Correctional Center, Decatur Correctional Center, Dixon Correctional Center, East Moline Correctional Center, Graham Correctional Center, Hill Correctional Center, Illinois River Correctional Center, Jacksonville Correctional Center, Lawrence Correctional Center, Lincoln Correctional Center, Logan Correctional Center, Menard Correctional Center, Menard Medium Security Unit, Pinckneyville Correctional Center, Pontiac Correctional Center, Pontiac Medium Security Unit, Robinson Correctional Center, Shawnee Correctional Center, Sheridan Correctional Center, Southwestern Illinois Correctional Center, Stateville Correctional Center, Taylorville Correctional Center, Vandalia Correctional Center, Vienna Correctional Center, Western Illinois Correctional Center). 

The amount of gate money that was distributed by each facility (listed above), separated by facility, for fiscal year 2024.  

 The budget area that gate money comes from for each facility.  

In the unlikely event that you claim any portion of the above public records to be exempt from disclosure under 5 ILCS 140, in writing please (i) identify which portion or portions you claim are exempt and the statutory provision or provisions you contend apply; (ii) set forth the reasons for your conclusion that such portion or portions are exempt; and (iii) release the remainder of such records for inspection and copying, redacting only the portion or portions you claim are exempt.   

Please note that the statute does not allow your agency to withhold documents in their entirety if only parts of the records may be exempt.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Emma Ruth

title: Freedom of Information Act ("FOIA") regarding pay equity non-compliance

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: Freedom of Information Act ("FOIA") regarding pay equity non-compliance
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

- Data pertaining to the audit or investigation of businesses that are not in compliance with pay equity standards and are not compliant with conciliation efforts with the Department of Labor as defined by 820 ILCS 112/11.  

- Number of investigations conducted.  

- Number of contracts or registration certificates revoked. 

In the unlikely event that you claim any portion of the above public records to be exempt from disclosure under 5 ILCS 140, in writing please (i) identify which portion or portions you claim are exempt and the statutory provision or provisions you contend apply; (ii) set forth the reasons for your conclusion that such portion or portions are exempt; and (iii) release the remainder of such records for inspection and copying, redacting only the portion or portions you claim are exempt.   

Please note that the statute does not allow your agency to withhold documents in their entirety if only parts of the records may be exempt.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Emma Ruth

title: Products provided by Carahsoft Technology Corp.

communications.subject: The Missouri Sunshine Law Request: Products provided by Carahsoft Technology Corp.
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the The Missouri Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

The St. Louis Police Department has purchased or leased numerous products from Carahsoft Technology Corp.  I would like to learn what particular products were acquired. Please provide contracts, leases, licenses, MOUs, MOAs, data agreements, letters of intent, with Carahsoft Technology Corp for the years 2022, 2023, and 2024.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Paul Tepper
